item.description:
This week we'll go on an improv adventure to the year 3000 where John Travolta pet's can talk but he and the alien looking Kirstie Alley have no clue what's going as their children rise up to get everything they've always wanted before the human race gets wiped out around Christmas time.

Hmm something doesn't sound right there....i think I may be combing two spectacularly great movies, haha.

Anywayz, everyone please take notice of the time shift for a few minutes just to allow some of us to get up to Harvard after seeing Giovanni's show at ImprovBoston right before.

Rock on!

Jason J.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll bring pets that can talk to each other, we can't hear them though
item.name: Look Who's Improving Now!
